entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
